column1: Smoque BBQ//// Having won a trip here through a fundraising auction
column2: I was fortunate (read: blessed by the BBQ gods) to sample Smoque's entire menu in one glorious
column3: pant-stretching visit. Everything from the baby back ribs to the smoked chicken raises the bar on what great barbecue should taste like. Indeed
column4: the food here was so outstanding that my face hurt from smiling so much while I was eating.
